divs: Sighting Detailsi admit i was young,however it has stuck with me my entire life. i was coming home from an errand for my mother when i noticed this triangle of three lights that alternated in color from red to yellow to blue in a counter clockwise manner. the object hovered in air about apx.200 ft. above me,i was alittle scared but more so facinated.it made no sound and i was used to aircraft flying out of mcdill afb.i got home and told my step dad to come and see,we stood there maybe an hour then it just sort of vanished.the next day we were at the laundrymat and i read about it in the tampa tribune,titled mysterious lights in sky.i have been facinated by the subject ever since.though my wife says i am insane for beleiving in ufo phenomena i cant deny what i saw.oh,if you held your hands up index finger to index finger that was about the size of the lights.
trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There were no other sightings in Tampa on or around April 30th 1972
Summary: Huge football field sized triangle of alternating lights.
